title: Alkylsilyl-Substituted Benzodithiophene-Based Small Molecules as Promising Hole-Transport Materials for Perovskite Solar Cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01617J, Communication
Maxim Sideltsev, Aleksandra Zhivchikova, Iliya E. Kuznetsov, Diana Sagdullina, Marina Tepliakova, Alexey Piryazev, Denis Anokhin, Maria Maksimovich, Natalia Nikitenko, Dimitri Ivanov, Alexander V Akkuratov
Organic semiconductor small molecules have gained significant attention as interfacial hole-transport materials (HTM) for application in perovskite solar cells (PSCs). Herein, we report the investigation of three donor-acceptor small molecules...
